Text.Name: ZhuJi
Text.Desc: Learn the methods and meaning of foundation training for outer disciples in this tutorial.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.2.TaskDesc: Tap to open the character panel
Text.Tasks.3.TaskDesc: Tap to open the Law & Cultivation menu.
Text.Tasks.4.TipsData.Desc: As shown in the image, if an outer disciple skips their daily training routine, their foundation will be reduced by 1k. Even a disciple who has completed their foundation training is no exception.
Text.Tasks.6.TipsData.Desc: An outer disciple's foundation training is only complete when their foundation reaches 25k. This is the foremost requirement to becoming an inner disciple.
Text.Tasks.9.TaskDesc: Tap to close the Law & Cultivation menu.
Text.Tasks.11.TaskDesc: Tap to open the Work Schedule menu.
Text.Tasks.12.TaskDesc: Click to open the Work Schedule menu.
Text.Tasks.22.TaskDesc: Tap Sect to open the Sect Buildings page.
Text.Tasks.23.UiData.Name: Sect
Text.Tasks.24.TaskDesc: Place the training spot at the designated location.
Text.Tasks.29.TaskDesc: Select a workstation to show its status below.
Text.Tasks.32.TaskDesc: Select the 2x speed to run the game
Text.Tasks.33.TaskDesc: Select the 2x speed to run the game
Text.Tasks.35.TaskDesc: Wait until the outer disciple enters the training spot and begins training.
Text.Tasks.37.TipsData.Desc: The player can arrange and adjust the time table for outer disciples' training to ensure that they follow their daily training routine. An outer disciple who has activated Work Hard will train outside of their daily work. Disciples with certain tags can gain foundation faster.
Text.Tasks.39.TaskDesc: Tap the detail on the item panel below
Text.Tasks.40.TaskDesc: Tap the detail on the item panel below
Text.Tasks.44.TipsData.Desc: The player can use the Status menu in the bottom at anytime to quickly access information on an outer disciple's foundation and adjust their training strategy.
Text.Tasks.46.TaskDesc: Tap to select the Bear Gall
Text.Tasks.46.UiData.Name: Eat
Text.Tasks.51.TaskDesc: Wait until Bear Gall is eaten.
Text.Tasks.53.TipsData.Desc: This disciple has quickly gained a lot of foundation by eating Bear Gall.
Text.Tasks.55.TipsData.Desc: Items like pills and elixirs can also be eaten to quickly gain a lot of foundation, and there are also other ways to accelerate foundation training, waiting for the player to explore.

Text.Name: GongSelect
Text.Desc: Learn how to select a suitable Law, the meaning of Law matching, how to study from a master and several common training modes in this tutorial.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Chapters.0.Tasks.2: Choose Law to Become Inner Disciple
Text.Chapters.1.DisplayName: Why Should Disciples Have a Master
Text.Tasks.2.TaskDesc: Tap the notification for completed foundation training in the left.
Text.Tasks.5.TaskDesc: Tap the Promote button in the disciple's Status below.
Text.Tasks.5.UiData.Name: Promote
Text.Tasks.7.TipsData.Desc: This disciple is not suitable for the current Law, please check if another disciple matches the Law.
Text.Tasks.8.TaskDesc: Tap to close the Choose Law menu.
Text.Tasks.10.TaskDesc: Tap and select another outer disciple.
Text.Tasks.11.TaskDesc: Tap the Promote button in the disciple's Status below.
Text.Tasks.11.UiData.Name: Promote
Text.Tasks.13.TipsData.Desc: The player can use the Law Matching chart to see if a disciple is suitable to practice the Law. The higher a disciple's Five Attributes are, the better they will match the Law, so different disciples may have different matching Laws.
Text.Tasks.17.TaskDesc: Tap the game speed button on the down-right corner
Text.Tasks.18.TaskDesc: Select the 2x speed to run the game
Text.Tasks.20.TaskDesc: Wait until the disciple is promoted.
Text.Tasks.22.TipsData.Desc: Once a Law is selected, it cannot be changed or canceled, so how well a Law matches will have a large influence on the disciple's future practice.
Text.Tasks.24.TaskDesc: Tap Mentor in the Status menu.
Text.Tasks.24.UiData.Name: Mentor
Text.Tasks.25.TaskDesc: Select an inner disciple in the state of Golden Core.
Text.Tasks.28.TaskDesc: Wait until the disciple acknowledges them as master.
Text.Tasks.31.TaskDesc: Tap to select the inner disciple in the state of Golden Core.
Text.Tasks.32.TipsData.Desc: A master can teach their disciples the manuals they have learned. When a master teaches a manual, it will cost less inspiration.
Text.Tasks.32.TipsData.Name: Teach
Text.Tasks.34.TipsData.Desc: When a disciple is promoted to an inner disciple, they can choose an inner disciple in the state of Golden Core or higher to be their master. When the disciple's Law is the same as the master's, the disciple's practice will be more efficient.

Text.Name: GetJingYuan
Text.Desc: Learn how to gain and automatically manage stamina in this tutorial.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.1.TaskDesc: Tap and select an inner disciple.
Text.Tasks.2.TaskDesc: Tap to switch to status panel
Text.Tasks.3.TipsData.Desc: You can check the stamina amount by checking the stamina bar in the status panel. An inner disciple's practice needs to continuously cost stamina, and when stamina hits 0, the disciple cannot keep practicing until they consume elixirs or food to replenish stamina.
Text.Tasks.6.TaskDesc: Tap the detail on the item panel below
Text.Tasks.8.TaskDesc: Tap to select the inner disciple you have just chosen
Text.Tasks.9.TaskDesc: Tap Eat in the character's Status menu.
Text.Tasks.9.UiData.Name: Eat
Text.Tasks.13.TaskDesc: Tap the game speed button on the down-right corner
Text.Tasks.14.TaskDesc: Select the 3x speed to run the game
Text.Tasks.17.TaskDesc: Wait until the NPC finish eating
Text.Tasks.21.TipsData.Desc: Check the Stamina bar in Status below. Now, the disciple's stamina has been replenished by consuming the elixir.
Text.Tasks.23.TaskDesc: Tap to switch to status panel
Text.Tasks.24.TaskDesc: Tap Practice in the character's Status menu.
Text.Tasks.26.TipsData.Desc: Inner disciples can also consume food and convert it to stamina, or increase the consumption rate of food and the gaining rate of stamina to further improve the conversion effect from food to stamina.
Text.Tasks.28.TaskDesc: Tap to open the character panel
Text.Tasks.29.TaskDesc: Tap to open the Law & Cultivation menu.
Text.Tasks.30.TipsData.Desc: The player can tap here to set Auto-eat so that the disciple will automatically eat food to gain stamina.
Text.Tasks.32.TipsData.Desc: The player can tap here to set Elixirs First so that the disciple will automatically choose to eat elixirs first to gain stamina.
Text.Tasks.34.TipsData.Desc: There are many items that increase stamina or the gaining rate of stamina, such as rare medicine and treasures, elixirs, talismans, etc.

Text.Name: FuQi
Text.Desc: Learn the meaning of Qi absorption and fasting and the different between the two in this tutorial.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Chapters.1.Tasks.3: Check the Qi Absorption Bar Again
Text.Tasks.2.TaskDesc: Tap the detail on the item panel below
Text.Tasks.5.TaskDesc: Tap and select an inner disciple.
Text.Tasks.6.TaskDesc: Tap to switch to status panel
Text.Tasks.7.TipsData.Desc: You can check the food bar on the panel below
Text.Tasks.9.TaskDesc: Tap Eat in the character's Status menu.
Text.Tasks.9.UiData.Name: Eat
Text.Tasks.13.TaskDesc: Tap the game speed button on the down-right corner
Text.Tasks.14.TaskDesc: Select the 3x speed to run the game
Text.Tasks.17.TaskDesc: Wait until the NPC finish eating
Text.Tasks.19.TipsData.Desc: You can check the food bar on the panel below
Text.Tasks.21.TipsData.Desc: The reason for fasting in the game is to reduce disciples' consumption of food and water to decrease their need for food and drink and therefore the cost of resources, but reducing an inner disciple's need for food and water will reduce the amount of stamina converted from food.
Text.Tasks.24.TaskDesc: Tap the detail on the item panel below
Text.Tasks.27.TaskDesc: Tap and select an inner disciple.
Text.Tasks.28.TaskDesc: Tap to switch to status panel
Text.Tasks.29.TipsData.Desc: You can check the food bar on the panel below
Text.Tasks.31.TaskDesc: Tap Eat in the character's Status menu.
Text.Tasks.31.UiData.Name: Eat
Text.Tasks.36.TaskDesc: Wait until the NPC finish eating
Text.Tasks.38.TipsData.Desc: You can check the food bar on the panel below
Text.Tasks.40.TipsData.Desc: The reason for Qi absorption is to gain energy from the environment in order to maintain the level of hunger and thirst. The more efficient a disciple absorbs Qi, the better they can convert food to stamina. When an inner disciple's consumption of food and water increase, the amount of stamina converted will increase too.

Text.Name: DProduction
Text.Desc: Learn how to craft artifacts, concoct elixirs and draw talismans in this tutorial.\n[color=#BC1717](During the tutorial, players can press Esc twice to skip the task and continue the tutorial. )[/color]
Text.Tasks.1.TipsData.Desc: After a disciple becomes an inner disciple, there will be new interactions waiting to be activated by building these unique buildings.
Text.Tasks.3.TaskDesc: Tap and select an inner disciple.
Text.Tasks.4.TaskDesc: Tap Alchemy in the character's Status menu.
Text.Tasks.4.UiData.Name: Alchemy
Text.Tasks.12.TaskDesc: Tap the Stamina Pill on the alchemy furnace panel.
Text.Tasks.14.TaskDesc: Tap the game speed button on the down-right corner
Text.Tasks.15.TaskDesc: Select the 3x speed to run the game
Text.Tasks.17.TaskDesc: Wait until the Stamina Pill is concocted.
Text.Tasks.19.TaskDesc: Tap the Stamina Pill on the alchemy furnace panel.
Text.Tasks.20.TaskDesc: Tap the close button by Stamina Pill in the Alchemy Furnace page below to cancel production.
Text.Tasks.22.TipsData.Desc: Concocting elixirs not only needs the basic materials for elixirs, but disciples also need to increase their alchemy level or learn other elixir recipes in order to concoct more advanced elixirs. The player can also use Loop to concoct elixirs in batch, or cancel the loop to stop concocting.
Text.Tasks.24.TaskDesc: Tap and select an inner disciple.
Text.Tasks.25.TaskDesc: Tap Craft in the character's Status menu.
Text.Tasks.25.UiData.Name: Craft
Text.Tasks.29.TaskDesc: You can select the Holy Stone Sword to check its material and tier, and the success rate and requirements for crafting are also shown above.
Text.Tasks.30.TipsData.Desc: Check the success rate and requirements for crafting
Text.Tasks.32.TaskDesc: You can select the Graystone Bladeto check its material and tier, and the success rate and requirements for crafting are also shown above.
Text.Tasks.33.TipsData.Desc: Check the success rate and requirements for crafting
Text.Tasks.36.TaskDesc: Wait until the artifact is crafted.
Text.Tasks.38.TipsData.Desc: Any common material can be used to craft artifacts, but it will cost an amount of Qi. The higher the tier, the more Qi it needs. The success rate for artifact crafting is positively associated with the disciple's mental state as well as their artifact crafting level.
Text.Tasks.40.TaskDesc: Tap Draw in the character's Status menu.
Text.Tasks.40.UiData.Name: Draw
Text.Tasks.41.TaskDesc: Tap to select a talisman paper.
Text.Tasks.45.TaskDesc: Please follow the instruction to draw a talisman and then confirm after it is finished.
Text.Tasks.48.TaskDesc: Wait until the talisman is drawn.
Text.Tasks.50.TaskDesc: Tap to select Talisman Drawing Table.
Text.Tasks.51.UiData.Name: Produce
Text.Tasks.52.TipsData.Desc: As shown in the Produce page, there are a few different kinds of talisman paper, which will have different bonus effects after the talisman is drawn. Generally speaking, the bonus effect is positively associated with the tier of the talisman paper.
Text.Tasks.55.TipsData.Desc: How well the player draws the talisman will be the quality of the final product, which is also an important factor that influences its effect.
Text.Tasks.58.TaskDesc: Tap the detail on the item panel below
Text.Tasks.59.TipsData.Desc: You can check the Qi amount absorbed by the rubbish.
Text.Tasks.70.TipsData.Desc: The player has obtained a few Spirit Stones by smelting rubbish just now.
Text.Tasks.72.TipsData.Desc: In the game, various items will gradually absorb Qi from nature. An inner disciple can smelt them to obtain Spirit Stones and dispose of unneeded resources.
